claims.claim: Lack of mental health support can lead to violent outcomes.
claims.quote: if you not doing mental health or self-care, you are a living, breathing, nuclear bomb waiting to go off, and you are going to destroy as many people around you

claims.claim: Engaging in mental health care can prevent personal and public tragedies.
claims.quote: Something clicked and mental health could have stopped that clicking. Mental health could have got his mental back on track where he could have seen things in a different perspective

claims.claim: Self-care is crucial to prevent harmful behavior towards oneself and others.
claims.quote: most people don't even do self care. So if you not doing mental health or self-care, you are a living, breathing, nuclear bomb waiting to go off

claims.claim: Social stigma should not deter individuals from seeking mental health care.
claims.quote: I'd rather go to the shrink and let them shrink my little head than be the five o'clock news. 'cause I didn't embarrass my whole family.
